Articles.Content:
G'day,

My name is Minion, and I've managed to go a whole day without killing any Kerbals. Mind you, that Mk I jet prototype was a close thing...

Seriously, played the freebee version, just got the full version, and loving it. Got inspired by watching a Pointy Haired Jedi YT vid of one of his livestreams. 

Going v-e-r-y slowly, and occasionally finding new controls etc.

G'day, mate!

You haven't killed any Kerbals? Tsk tsk, rookie mistake.

Welcome aboard!
